definition: traditionally used as phonetic for ga/also pr. [ga1]/also pr. [qie2]
see 唯識宗|唯识宗[Wei2 shi2 zong1]
see 唯識宗|唯识宗[Wei2 shi2 zong1]

sentences.english: Chronic conditions are managed equally well with chiropractic or yoga.
sentences.chinese: 慢性病通过脊神经疗法或者瑜伽均可获得显著疗效。

sentences.english: Purna Yoga is an improvisation of the traditional systems of Yoga.
sentences.chinese: 整体瑜伽是传统瑜伽体系的即兴创作。

sentences.english: Purna Yoga is an improvisation of the traditional systems of Yoga.
sentences.chinese: 整体瑜伽是传统瑜伽体系的即兴创作。

sentences.english: Yoga is very popular especially in Los Angeles.
sentences.chinese: 瑜伽在洛杉矶尤其流行。

sentences.english: After it is available, I am denied for the access to Bikram Yoga.
sentences.chinese: 它是可用后，我被剥夺了对高温瑜伽访问。

sentences.english: Some types of yoga also involve meditation and chanting.
sentences.chinese: 一些瑜伽也会伴随着冥想和咏唱。

sentences.english: because I have to walk a really long way from the subway to get to the Yoga studio.
sentences.chinese: 因为我从地铁到瑜伽工作室要走很长的一段路。

sentences.english: Asana make one firm, free from maladies, and light of limb.
sentences.chinese: 瑜伽姿态使人坚决，阔别疾病并领有轻巧的身体。

sentences.english: It is known as the Aajna Chakra in the language of Yoga.
sentences.chinese: 在瑜伽系统中，这里被称为眉心轮。

sentences.english: So, I really feel so glad to teach her.
sentences.chinese: 为此，我感到很开心，很高兴曾教她瑜伽。

sentences.english: The cushion-y comfort and non-slip traction it provides keeps me motivated to keep practicing.
sentences.chinese: 它的舒适感和防滑作用保持了我对瑜伽练习的热情。

sentences.english: Practising yoga will help to ease nervous tension.
sentences.chinese: 练习瑜伽可以绥解精神上的紧张。

sentences.english: Lunge into the side angle pose with this standing yoga position.
sentences.chinese: 到一边角度提出这个弓步站立瑜伽立场。

sentences.english: Whatever yoga or retreat, can let in natural edify down completely relax.
sentences.chinese: 无论瑜伽还是静修，都能让在自然的熏染下完全放松。

sentences.english: My yoga guru is going to teach us about breathing today.
sentences.chinese: 我的瑜伽宗师教我们关于今天呼吸。

definition: to exercise/to keep fit/to work out/physical exercise
shadowboxing or Taiji, T'aichi or T'aichichuan/traditional form of physical exercise or relaxation/a martial art
to run/to jog/(military) to march at the double
